data.name: ForeVR Bowl
data.description:
Whether you are looking for a casual game with friends or rekindling a family rivalry... ForeVR Bowl has you covered! 

Explore 8 immersive lanes (The Moon, TIki Hall, Atlantis, & more!) and unlock 150+ unique bowling balls to find your perfect game. Climb the leaderboard and win weekly events and challenges. Choose from 1000s of songs on the YouTube powered Jukebox. Bowling solo, online multiplayer, or local pass-and-play will never be the same in VR!

Pick a side in 'Versus Mode' each week to win prizes for your team. Strike a pose with friends and document your Bowling Night fun with the brand new Selfie Cam. Search each hall for unlock-able Hidden Balls.

ForeVR Bowl is THE premium Oculus Quest bowling simulator!

"ForeVR Bowl is bowling in VR done right." - The VRGrid

CNET Editor's Pick: "Best VR Bowling" and one of "Best [Meta] Quest 2 Games and Experiences"

toms guide pick "Oculus Quest 2 — here's the 7 games you should play first"

changelog.change_log:
WHAT’S NEW
🎳 ForeVR Bowl now supports Mixed Reality. To enable:
1. Select your hall
2. Open settings (flat “hamburger”  button on the left controller)
3. Select "MR"
4. Enable!

IMPROVEMENTS
🎳 Bug fixes

KNOWN ISSUES
🎳 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

WHAT’S NEW
🎳 Cross Play support between Oculus and Steam
🎳 Daily Spinner!
🎳 Contact Support through the Pause Menu!
🎳 The Meta Avatar Marketplace is officially open and can be found in the Lobby.
🎳 Manage friends through party menu

IMPROVEMENTS
🎳 Faster matchmaking and room creation using Quick Match
🎳 Improved Multiplayer stability
🎳 Bug fixes

KNOWN ISSUES
🎳 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

WHAT’S NEW
🎳 Started investigating a Leprechauns trail 🌈
🎳 Bug Fixes
🎳 The Meta Avatar Marketplace is officially open and can be found in the Lobby.

KNOWN ISSUES
🎳 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

WHAT’S NEW
🎳 Started investigating a Leprechauns trail 🌈

KNOWN ISSUES
🎳 Need support?

WHAT’S NEW 
🎳 YouTube Media Share
🎳 Multiplayer Updates (See Developer Post for more)
 
SUPPORT
❓ Found a bug, or experiencing an issue? Reach out to our team at help.forevrgames.com!

Happy spooky szn, bowlers! 🎃 ForeVR Bowl 1.14 brings a ton of changes, including:

🎳 Upgraded throw
🎳 Pro Shop tutorial for new users
🎳 Main Menu tutorial for new users
🎳 5 Spooky bowling balls with blacklight effects
🎳 Blacklight Boo-wling: Spooky ghostly NPCs 👻 and frightful decor 🎃 in the Blacklight Hall

SUPPORT
🎳 Need support, or found a bug? Reach out at help.forevrgames.com!

IMPROVEMENTS
🎳 Various bug fixes

KNOWN ISSUES
🎳 Sometimes when accepting an invite while the results screen is showing in a hall, it will cause players to be able to play in different halls. If this is encountered, please leave and then rejoin the party, and the issue should be fixed. 
🎳 Very rarely, the game may crash when repeatedly joining and leaving the same party. 
🎳 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

IMPROVEMENTS
🎳 Various bug fixes

KNOWN ISSUES
🎳 Sometimes when accepting an invite while the results screen is showing in a hall, it will cause players to be able to play in different halls. If this is encountered, please leave and then rejoin the party, and the issue should be fixed. 
🎳 Very rarely, the game may crash when repeatedly joining and leaving the same party. 
🎳 Need support? help.forevrgames.com

IMPROVEMENTS

🎳 Ball Pro Shop has been reorganized! Balls will now be sorted by the level they unlock at. Blacklight and Hidden balls will still be in their collections. This also includes a refresh of the store backsplashes! 
🎳 When no open games are found when selecting “Quick Match”, a new public multiplayer game will be created for you! 
🎳 Multiplayer stability improvements! 
🎳 Fixed! Resolved an issue where players’ Oculus avatars were invisible in multiplayer matches.
🎳 Fixed! Resolved an issue where players were able to enter two different halls even though they were in the same party.
🎳 Fixed! Resolved an issue where the spare SFX appears when the throw is a foul. 
🎳 Fixed! In some instances, players were unable to see each other when joining a party. 

KNOWN ISSUES
🎳 Sometimes when accepting an invite while the results screen is showing in a hall, it will cause players to be able to play in different halls. If this is encountered, please leave and then rejoin the party, and the issue should be fixed. 
🎳Very rarely, the game may crash when repeatedly joining and leaving the same party. 
🎳 Need support? help.forevrgames.com

IMPROVEMENTS
🎳 Updated to Meta Avatar SDK 12. 
🎳 Increased NPC animation framerate on both Quest 1 and Quest 2 headsets.
🎳 Improved NPC performance on Quest 1 headsets.
🎳 Fixed issue causing NPCs to flicker.
🎳 Fixed issue when entering an invalid Room Code did not display an error message.
🎳 Fixed issue where the Room Code number pad blocks the Main Menu for seated players.
🎳 Fixed issue when collecting Disco Diva and High Desert hidden balls did not count towards total owned balls.

KNOWN ISSUES
🎳 Nameplate disconnects from player avatar when moving around the Guardian boundary.
🎳 Need support? http://help.forevrgames.com

WHAT’S NEW
It’s ForeVR Bowl’s 1st Birthday! Join in the fun with the Bowliversary birthday bash, happening now until June 26th. Earn 4x XP and 10x Coins in all Multiplayer games, and purchase the exclusive 1st Bowliversary ball in the Pro Shop for just 1 Coin! Keep an eye out for our Oculus developer post for more information, or hop in now to check out the party! 
Thanks for an amazing first year, bowlers! 

IMPROVEMENTS
🎳 Improved bowling ball sound effect when rolling and hitting pins
🎳 Tuned ambient noise issue in the halls
🎳 Improved pointer beam usability and visibility
🎳 Foot pads now appear on thumbstick tilt
🎳 Lifetime best score added to statistics wall
🎳 Fixed issue where bowling ball appeared detached from the player’s hand while held
🎳 Fixed issue where camera did not come back after being inactive for 30 seconds
🎳 Fixed issue where players weren’t able to level up multiple times in a single game
🎳 Reduced level requirements for early level bowling balls
🎳 Hand effects now appear consistent size. (For more information access the help center from the jukebox)
🎳 Oil patterns are now visible by default
🎳 Removed invisible wall in the ForeVR 90s Hall
🎳 Bug fixes

KNOWN ISSUES
🎳 Need support? help.forevrgames.com

IMPROVEMENTS
🎳 Bug fixes


🎳 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

IMPROVEMENTS
🎳 Bug fixes

KNOWN ISSUES
🎳 Picking up the Camera with the right hand intermittently deactivates menu pointer blocking the ability to post to Discord. All in-game photos are accessible through the Files app on your Oculus headset until this bug is resolved.
🎳 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

HAPPY ST. PATRICK’S DAY!

It’s your LUCKY day! ForeVR Bowl had a fury of festive friends leave their mark on the lobby. These lovable leprechauns have hit the lanes with a few tricks:
🍀 5 new hidden blacklight reactive bowling balls
🍀 A gift to be found at the end of the rainbow - daily!
🍀 Event runs 3/17 - 3/31

IMPROVEMENTS
🎳 Oculus Avatar tutorial for new players
🎳 Bug fixes

KNOWN ISSUES
🎳 Picking up the Camera with the right hand intermittently deactivates menu pointer blocking the ability to post to Discord. All in-game photos are accessible through the Files app on your Oculus headset until this bug is resolved.
🎳 Need support? Help.forevrgames.com

WHAT’S NEW
🎳 ForeVR 90s invites you to roll in brand new Blacklight Bowling mode… it’s lit!
🎳 5 unique Bowling Balls with special Blacklight mode effect
🎳 New Optimized throw type: This throw adds additional points of optimization to our current throw. Players can select between Classic (launch throw), Default (aka “Throw 2.0”), and Optimized for whatever feels best!
🎳 Updated starting arsenal for new players featuring player favorites: Rolling Gold, Beginner Blast, and Earth
🎳 Earth bowling ball now unlocks at Level 1
🎳 5 New Super Bowling sports balls!
🎳 Deck the Hall Holiday Hall melted
🎳 Holiday Hall balls unwrapped and available in the store
🎳 Updated Media Player: Our Jukebox now features the playlists you love PLUS help articles and creator content
🎳 Multiplayer Quick Match button. Join an open multiplayer lobby in one click

IMPROVEMENTS
🎳 Frame Reset button resets the pins, player turn, and ball return in multiplayer games. Pro Tip: this is a great way to troubleshoot connections, if your party gets out of sync try Frame Reset!
🎳 Snap to in-game Foot pads to quickly navigate around the lobby and hall when using teleport
🎳 Localization updates
🐞 Bug fixes

🎳Need support? help.forevrgames.com
